embeddedItem.name: Rice Plant Panicle
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, increases Incoming Healing of all allies by <nobr>18%</nobr> for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
The pleasant smell gives you good appetite, so you choose not to ask why seeds planted on Protein Rice can yield flowers.

"The wind carries its fragrance down the waterway."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

272534.name: Seed
272534.lore:
Reproductive unit unique to plants.
Most of them symbolize life, some of them taste pretty good.

"Sow in the spring, harvest in the Autumn."
comeFrom: Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

641099.name: Protein Rice
641099.lore:
Nature's gift to human society, friend of mankind, savior of lives.
Smooth as egg white and full of protein.

"Every grain costs sweat and blood."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station
